items.title: Patriots Owner’s Son Drops Out of Boston Mayoral Race
items.summary: Josh Kraft had harshly criticized the policies of Mayor Michelle Wu, a fellow Democrat, but his message did not resonate with voters.

items.title: Lawyers for Venezuelans Ask Court to Press D.H.S. on Temporary Protections
items.summary: A judge had ordered that Temporary Protected Status be kept in place, but Venezuelans who needed to re-register weren’t able to.

items.title: Homeless Funding Was Limited to Groups Aligned With Trump Policies, Suit Says
items.summary: The Trump administration had imposed conditions on grants awarded by the Department of Housing and Urban Development that critics viewed as overtly political.

items.title: The Last Person to Question Charlie Kirk
items.summary: Millions of people saw the brief exchange between the right-wing political activist and a liberal TikToker after footage of the assassination spread like wildfire across social media.

items.title: Patel and F.B.I. Face Scrutiny as Kirk’s Killer Remains at Large
items.summary: Already, a series of missteps by Kash Patel, the F.B.I. director, in recent months have invited worries that he has eroded public confidence in the agency.

items.title: ICE Agents Can’t Wear Masks Under Bill Passed in California
items.summary: The legislation responds to immigration raids by federal agents who have shielded their identity. It heads to Gov. Gavin Newsom, who has not said whether he would sign it.

items.title: Utah officials share video of Charlie Kirk shooting suspect as governor pledges death penalty - live
items.summary: <p>Briefing follows release of four new images of suspect and reward offer of $100,000</p><ul><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shooting-police-search-for-suspect-amid-condemnation-of-targeted-killing">Hunt continues for suspect who fatally shot Charlie Kirk</a></p></li><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shooting-maps-videos-images">How the shooting unfolded – in maps, videos and images</a></p></li></ul><p>A <strong>UK</strong> offshoot of a <strong>US</strong> conservative group set up by <strong>Charlie</strong> <strong>Kirk</strong> is to hold a vigil in <strong>London</strong> after he was shot dead, reports the PA news agency.</p><p><strong>Turning Point UK</strong> has said its activists will gather on Friday evening by the <strong>Montgomery statue</strong> in <strong>Whitehall</strong> and called on others to “join us in remembering Charlie”.</p><p>It’s absolutely shocking, we’re heartbroken over here in the UK.</p><p>My thoughts this evening are with the loved ones of Charlie Kirk.</p><p>It is heartbreaking that a young family has been robbed of a father and a husband.</p><p>Political violence has no place in our societies.</p><p>Our thoughts and condolences are with his family.</p><p>An atrocious murder, a deep wound for democracy and for those who believe in freedom.</p><p>My condolences to his family, to his loved ones, and to the American conservative community.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shot-latest-news-updates-utah-university-donald-trump">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Charlie Kirk shooting: new video of suspect released by FBI amid urgent appeal for help from the public
items.summary: <p>FBI reward of $100,000 and direct appeals for public support appear to signal law enforcement’s continued struggles to identify the killer of Trump ally</p><ul><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shot-latest-news-updates-utah-university-donald-trump"><strong>Follow latest updates live</strong></a></p></li><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shooting-maps-videos-images"><strong>How the shooting unfolded – in maps, videos and images</strong></a></p></li></ul><p>US officials have issued an urgent appeal for help from the public as they continue to search for the shooter of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, releasing new videos and photos from the scene of the attack in Utah.</p><p>More than 24 hours after <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/10/charlie-kirk-shot-utah">Kirk was shot while speaking</a> in front of thousands of people at a Utah university, the state’s governor, appearing alongside FBI director Kash Patel and other officials, said “we need as much help as we can possibly get.”</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/12/charlie-kirk-shooting-new-video-of-suspect-released-by-fbi-asamid-urgent-appeal-for-help-from-the-public">Continue reading...</a>
